name: Doom II: Hell on Earth
description: Uses the files from the Windows installer from GOG.
notes:
Audio (MIDI and sound FX) should work without additional setup.

To get better quality MIDI audio:
   I - Configure --> Game Options --> Main File --> Select 'dosbox_doom2_settings.conf'
   II - Run the game and you'll start the Setup
   III - Choose Music Card --> General MIDI --> 330
   IV - Save Parameters and Launch Doom II
   V - Exit game, Configure --> Game Options --> Main File --> Select 'dosbox_doom2_single.conf'
   VI - Need to install fluid-soundfont-gm and fluidsynth.  For Mint 19:
sudo apt install -y fluid-soundfont-gm fluidsynth
  VII - Open terminal and run the command (needs to be run each time you want to play):
fluidsynth -l -s -i -aalsa -o audio.alsa.device=default /usr/share/sounds/sf2/FluidR3_GM.sf2
  VIII - Start the game.
content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
- file2: https://lutris.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com/tools/innoextract/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosbox_doom2.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file2
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "$file1"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/app
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_doom2_single.conf
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_doom2_settings.conf
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_doom2.conf
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosbox_doom2.conf
    key: aspect
    section: render
    value: true
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosbox_doom2.conf
    key: output
    section: sdl
    value: overlay
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosbox_doom2.conf
    key: fullscreen
    section: sdl
    value: false
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosbox_doom2.conf
    key: fullresolution
    section: sdl
    value: 1920x1080
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosbox_doom2.conf
    key: midiconfig
    section: midi
    value: '128:0'
main_file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosbox_doom2_single.conf
